thread.section_title: Usgobuy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Usgobuy | www.usgobuy.com | 2 of 7
thread.title: KW Adams

author: KW Adams
title: KW Adams
text:
When II heard of USGOBUY for the first time, I never knew that my dream of shopping in the US and having my items shipped to Kampala, Uganda would turn into reality. Yes, I had spent time getting better deals off Amazon but with the "May not ship to Uganda" being the limit.
Thanks to USGOBUY who offered me not only a free US mailing address but too ensured that my shipments are delivered in time. It only takes a matter of minutes to create an account and get a free US mailing address since its very easy.
When it comes to shipping, USGOBUY is a service I trust, and one I can recommend to everyone. Yes, sometimes there are some delays which are out of their boundaries but still, USGOBUY gets the item arrived very quick no matter the shipping option.
My last delivery arrived in only 10 days as opposed to the 1-7 weeks waiting time when using standard shipping. USGOBY, thanks for the great service..
